item.title: Passenger Address System (Courier/Supernumerary Address System) – Passenger Address Controller Circuits

remarks.para: One circuit may be inoperative provided the operative controller circuit is selected.

numlitem.para: The Captain or designee will verbally advise the upper deck occupants of normal and emergency procedures.

placard.para: Placard near Captain’s Audio Selector panel "PASSENGER ADDRESS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
